TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypedList

summary.span: 提供发现可绑定列表架构的功能，其中可用于绑定的属性不同于要绑定到的对象的公共属性。

span.span: Provides functionality to discover the schema for a bindable list, where the properties available for binding differ from the public properties of the object to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果，例如，你将使用此接口对象，表示`customer`表，你想要绑定到属性`customer`对象表示，不是属性的。Use this interface if, for instance, you are using a object that represents a `customer` table, you want to bind to the properties on the `customer` object that the represents, not the properties of the . 此接口不需要的可绑定列表的设计时支持。This interface is not required for design-time support of a bindable list. 绑定到数据可以发生在运行时或在设计器中，但有两个规则。Binding to data can occur either at run time or in a designer, but there are rules for both. 在运行时，你可以将绑定到以下任何方面的数据：At run time, you can bind to data in any of the following: - - 实施者、 提供实施者具有强类型化属性 (即，算作是)。Implementer of , provided the implementer has a strongly typed property (that is, the is anything but ). 你可以完成此操作通过进行的默认实现私有。You can accomplish this by making the default implementation of private. 如果你想要创建后面的强类型集合的规则，应派生自。If you want to create an that follows the rules of a strongly typed collection, you should derive from . - 实施者。Implementer of . 在设计器中，你可以初始化绑定到按照相同的规则的对象。In a designer, you can initialize binding to objects by following the same rules. 绑定到数据源的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information on binding to a data source, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现接口。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface. 名为的泛型类型`SortableBindingList`派生自类并实现接口。A generic type named `SortableBindingList` derives from the class and implements the interface. 有关完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 实现 ITypedList 接口](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/CS/SortableBindingList.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/VB/SortableBindingList.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetItemProperties(class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor[] listAccessors) cil managed
Public Function GetItemProperties (listAccessors As PropertyDescriptor()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

param.name: listAccessors
param.span: 要在组合中查找的可绑定的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects to find in the collection as bindable.

summary.span: 返回 ，其表示每一项上用于绑定数据的属性。

span.span: Returns the that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.

returns.span: ，其表示每一项上用于绑定数据的属性。

span.span: The that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`listAccessors`参数不是`null`，它通常包含标识要检索的实现的对象的容器列表的属性描述符。If the `listAccessors` parameter is not `null`, it typically contains a property descriptor that identifies a list of containers to retrieve for the object that implements . 例如，包含两个表，`myCustomers`和`myOrders`，与它们调用之间的关系`myCustOrders`。For example, a containing two tables, `myCustomers` and `myOrders`, with a relationship between them called `myCustOrders`. 如果你创建对象以查看`myCustomers`，然后调用方法替换`null`返回中的列的属性描述符`myCustomers`。If you create a object to view `myCustomers`, then calling the method with `null` returns the property descriptors for the columns in `myCustomers`. 因此，返回的属性描述符之一是属性的属性描述符`myCustOrders`，则只需为调用具有包含的属性说明符列表访问器数组方法`myCustOrders`将返回的属性描述符有关`myOrders`。As a result, one of the returned property descriptors is a property descriptor for `myCustOrders`, just as calling the method with a list accessor array containing the property descriptors for `myCustOrders` will return the property descriptors for `myOrders`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 有关完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 实现 ITypedList 接口](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/CS/SortableBindingList.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/VB/SortableBindingList.vb#3)]

Returns the name of the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法只能在设计时框架，并且由已过时控件。This method is used only in the design-time framework and by the obsolete control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 有关完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 实现 ITypedList 接口](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md).
